feed.title: Typebot Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Typebot: v3.7.0
entry.content:
New features

  • âœ¨ Add "Send Feed Event" Blink action [14b1a26]
  • âœ¨ Add "Return" logic block [ecda1d8]
  • âœ¨ (openai) Add new 4.1 models [86e8477]

UI/UX Improvements

  • ğŸ’„ Fix long tag overflowing in tags input [48531c0]
  • ğŸš¸ (analytics) Take into account Jump blocks for analytics [6cd0705]
  • ğŸ’„ Fix chat bubble window dynamic height on mobile [04d2a2d]
  • ğŸš¸ Add error toast on workspace member inviation failure [f2a3ff0]
  • ğŸ’„ Fix border on file attached on text input [26fd11a]
  • ğŸ’„ Remove hero height constraint on mobild to fix scroll glitch [10cf18d]
  • ğŸ’„ Fix condition items overflow with long variable names [9305ae8]
  • ğŸš¸ (lp) fix scroll glitch ios due to vh height [b69d76d]
  • ğŸ’„ (lp) remove book a demo button [9cc6054]
  • ğŸš¸ (auth) Add user change email form [47107e3]
  • ğŸ’„ fix combobox input border color [1f133d1]
  • ğŸš¸ Place button settings floating button on top right [786accd]
  • ğŸ’„ Fix Items list top alignment [3c11131]
  • ğŸš¸ Improve pexels picker with options [14d341f]
  • ğŸš¸ (calCom) Add custom question prefill option [42cf1f3]

Fixed

  • ğŸ› Fix getInDepthAnalyticsData invalid request when typebot is not defined [30d5ceb]
  • ğŸ› Fix webhook listening error when body is not JSON [9a1907d]
  • ğŸ› Fix restore published bot not working on v6.1 [e1c7c27]
  • ğŸ› Fix buttons invalid reply when internal value is empty string [79254cb]
  • ğŸ› Add ENTERPRISE plan in hasProPerks helper function [abde422]
  • ğŸ› Map allow comments and reation Blink options [0027867]
  • ğŸ› Fix black background not showing on popup embed [1f1baad]
  • ğŸ› Fix resetOutgoingEdgeIdProp, look for from props only [ba338b1]
  • ğŸ› Fix cards block duplication [a78498f]
  • ğŸ› Update invitation count query to exclude guests from existing members [1d43f14]
  • ğŸ› (condition) matched condition without connected edge should end the session [a43173c]
  • ğŸ› Fix Else item not displayed [85eafc2]
  • ğŸ’š Fix CI build [8a9e16e]
  • ğŸ› (cards) Dynamic internal value not being saved [ec5bd44]
  • ğŸ› Fix svg image not displaying on Firefox [7807d4c]
  • ğŸ› Fix file re-upload not working [d007ad0]
  • ğŸ› Fix TypebotHeader overlapping blocks settings window [148b64d]
  • ğŸ› Fix results files duplication on typebot duplication [ee8a41c]
  • ğŸ’š Explicitely add GITHUB_TOKEN in auto tag workflow [547ecac]
  • ğŸ› Fix clientSideActions executed from linked bot [98309fc]
  • ğŸš‘ Fix maximum callstack size issue from setVariableHistory [21767d2]
  • ğŸ› Fix copy/paste not pasting variable ids in block items [08ad395]
  • ğŸ› Correctly update startTimeout in exec loop [2a85bb2]
  • ğŸ› Correctly update start time in group execution loop [98b3383]
  • ğŸš‘ Fix edge case when calling link to typebot after input [601ddf3]
  • ğŸ› Fix starting preview from group not working [25808a9]
  • ğŸš‘ Fix previous typebot link freeze [6953a5e]
  • ğŸš‘ Fix typebot link block freeze [54ed980]
  • ğŸ’š Fix cards options type error [997c455]
  • ğŸ› (cards) Fix variables saving not working [ea53db5]
  • ğŸ› Fix buttons border color not applied [4836bf1]
  • ğŸ› Fix ColorPicker behind other elements in theme config [a88fa63]
  • ğŸ’š (lp) Fix window is not defined error from embed bubble loading [ba5dafb]
  • ğŸ› Add Cote D'Ivoire (+225) to country code options [77818e4]
  • ğŸ› Update contacts schema in OpenAPI definitions to use arrays for contacts and phones [508d339]
  • ğŸ› (whatsapp) Update incomingMessageSchema to use an array for contacts [9c1e82a]

Content

  • ğŸ“ Add "feedback chatbot" blog post (#2140) [ea91378]
  • ğŸ“ Add "lead generation form examples" blog post (#2054) [8a20050]
  • ğŸ“ Add "HTML Form Generator" blog post (#2011) [43bacc4]
  • ğŸ“ Add v3.6 newsletter [f47eda9]
  • ğŸ“ Update settings documentation to include system messages feature [19d1a56]
  • ğŸ“ Add Query Knowledge Base section to Dify.AI documentation [93908a9]
  • ğŸ“ Add formatting options for Number input block documentation [24c6278]
  • ğŸ“ Update Buttons documentation to include item options and display conditions [b8a63a9]
  • ğŸ“ Add Security Policy doc [ba02684]

Internal

  • ğŸ”§ Add "Missing credentialsId" to Sentry ignore messages [9c1b980]
  • â™»ï¸ Improve transcript computation for jump and return blocks [8ab1f02]
  • ğŸ”§ Update GitHub Actions workflow to use CONTENTS_RW_PAT for GITHUB_TOKEN [d32b6f8]
  • â™»ï¸ Migrate chat api schemas to its own package [1217bd5]
  • ğŸ—ƒï¸ Add Enterprise to Plan enum [9844126]
  • ğŸ”’ Add necessary auto add project workflow PAT [a95364f]
  • ğŸ”’ Remove use of PAT in Github workflows [59627ab]
  • â™»ï¸ Simplify walk the flow logic in bot engine (#2127) [81ef7df]
  • â™»ï¸ Misc types improvement (#2120) [fe8469f]

Miscellaneous

  • ğŸ§‘â€ğŸ’» Use custom HOSTNAME and PORT in docker entrypoints (#2148) [ce637fb]
  • ğŸ§‘â€ğŸ’» Upgrade to next-auth v5 and next v15 [3f53bfe]
  • ğŸ©¹ Fix "Generated HTML" auto height [8d7163d]

entry.title: New release for Typebot: v3.7.1
entry.content:
Fixed

  • ğŸ› Fix host trusting issue for self-hosting instances [9737fee]

Content

  • ğŸ“ Add "Chatbot Survey Questions" blog post (#2149) [71be123]

entry.title: New release for Typebot: v3.8.0
entry.content:
New features

  • âœ¨ Add "Allow search engines to index" option (#2163) [ac510ab]
  • âœ¨ Add Invalid Reply event node [b20b9ba]
  • âœ¨ Add Reply event block (#2114) [1ca7040]

UI/UX Improvements

  • ğŸš¸ Scroll to bottom of settings when test http response is received [267b495]
  • ğŸ’„ (embed) Fix vertical buttons width on medium screen [338793c]
  • ğŸš¸ (embed) Improve chat container responsivity and caroussel width [7a11d5f]
  • ğŸ’„ (setVariable) Improve block content preview UI especially for long code content [492e365]
  • ğŸ’„ Update builder OG image [f495093]
  • ğŸš¸ (date) Allow for YY and DD to be interpreted as yy and dd [e19a839]
  • ğŸ’„ Remove New tags on old templates [629cb3c]
  • ğŸš¸ Only execute reply event with outgoind edge id [45f7e2c]
  • ğŸš¸ Improve Card item manipulation [924a57b]
  • ğŸš¸ Add isOpen and isHidden props to Bubble embed [0552d14]
  • ğŸš¸ (dateInput) Add submit on Enter press (#2176) [a322789]

Fixed

  • âœï¸ Update next.js package install snippet (#2196) [cf4922f]
  • ğŸ› Fix NocoDB not working with Link fields [3f4ddc7]
  • ğŸ› (engine) Sanitize variable value before saving to avoid db insert failure [b041842]
  • ğŸ› Fix retrocompat issue, allow null message on continueChat endpoint [07cec85]
  • ğŸ› Improve invalid regex handling in comparison logic [78a1ce2]
  • ğŸ’š Add typecheck scripts and fix types issues [0940a1b]
  • ğŸ› (embed) Fix client side result set as the last input answer [7479c15]
  • ğŸ› Fix save variable data mapping suggestion for arrays with mixed objects [3a2ac4f]
  • ğŸ› Normalize file type extension comparison in parseReply function [c28c39b]
  • ğŸ› Fix anticipated end with nested link to typebot [0a34f7a]
  • âœï¸ Fix Next.js deployment doc title [433105c]
  • ğŸ› Fix bot container size reactivity on children [d745438]
  • ğŸ› Fix Card item drag on text area resize and allow textarea scroll [79f6521]
  • ğŸ› Fix buttons input option auto opening when it shouldn't [2dc6b00]
  • ğŸ› Fix static positioned bubble placeholder size [b614bf7]
  • ğŸš‘ Remove test Bubble from viewer [018767a]
  • ğŸ› Fix Bot premature isEnded flag when response has only clientSideActions [46089d6]
  • ğŸ› Refactor populateEdgesWithTotalVisits to fix dropoff compute edge cases [b0189f7]
  • ğŸ› Fix WA crash when trying to send duplicate buttons (after truncation) [3c8cc89]
  • ğŸ› Fix custom oauth OIDC URL discovery [2c1ca26]
  • ğŸ› Fix custom OAuth not working after Auth.js upgrade to v5 [af63487]
  • ğŸ› Fix color picker elevation on share instructions modals [4ca143e]
  • ğŸš‘ Fix client side actions not triggered when first block in group [6715e06]
  • ğŸš‘ Add default returnMark status [28c77d3]
  • ğŸš‘ Fix command event not triggering [280a91c]

Content

  • ğŸ“ Add "Product recommendation quiz shopify" blog post (#2180) [924ae28]
  • ğŸ“ Add progress bar docs [0c883b9]
  • ğŸ“ Add "Business Continuity" page [4f3c270]
  • ğŸ“ Add "Voiceflow vs flowise" blog post (#2173) [34a8da5]
  • ğŸ“ Add "WhatsApp API use cases" blog post (#2169) [6d21dc2]

Internal

  • ğŸ”§ Disable Sentry trace sampling [fd8bc81]
  • ğŸ”§ Add common trpc error message in ignore list [9a9285c]
  • â™»ï¸ Remove global signals from embed lib to avoid conflict with multiple bots [081654f]
  • â™»ï¸ (embed) export commands file [6df30d9]
  • â™»ï¸ (embed) improve buttons layout on small windows [bab77ef]
  • â™»ï¸ (embed) Use @tailwindcss/container-queries and improve layout for small containers in height [2e49fc0]
  • â™»ï¸ (embed) lift colors CSS up [ab907f1]
  • ğŸ”§ Add "/business-continuity" to lp pages in next.config [d5ec6d5]
  • â™»ï¸ (commandEvent) Remove Resume after option [466fc47]

Miscellaneous

  • ğŸ§‘â€ğŸ’» Make react package ssr compatible and deprecate nextjs package [28c149c]
  • ğŸ§‘â€ğŸ’» Add reload embed command [c94266d]

entry.title: New release for Typebot: v3.9.0
entry.content:
New features

  • âœ¨ Display Root page in viewer when matching root path on viewer url [e239ead]

UI/UX Improvements

  • âš¡ Remove trpc http batch link [015a82e]
  • ğŸš¸ Re-organize Script settings for better UX [1e16158]
  • ğŸ’„ Fix groups dropdown displaying ID instead of title [0ee75cf]
  • ğŸš¸ (blink) Add isOrdered to card content section array [a487c55]
  • ğŸš¸ Add variable option on Jump and Typebot link blocks [fd4fe0c]
  • ğŸš¸ Remove dialog expansion, instead expand popover [000495d]
  • ğŸš¸ (textInput) Add Input mode option [b76dad1]
  • ğŸš¸ Add terms consent in onboarding bot [7d1b73b]

Fixed

  • ğŸ› (lp) Fix trackPageView not being called on first route change [e415c72]
  • ğŸ’š Fix vitest build error mismatch vite peer dep version [d182f42]
  • ğŸ› Fix network error toast showing up in some scenario even if no error was returned [06d82ad]
  • ğŸ› Fix embed bubble wait for event not working in linked bot [97d050c]
  • ğŸ› Remove play button on focused group in analytics graph [34ba46f]
  • ğŸ› Improve error handling in receiveMessage function by simplifying error parsing and logging [1d16277]
  • ğŸ’š Add missing types for new tax IDs [208f81d]
  • ğŸ› Add some missing Tax IDs [c765b57]
  • ğŸ› Fix negative in-depth dropoff in some loop scenario [3a1d7b9]
  • ğŸ› Fix select box height offset [ed2ec66]
  • ğŸ› Fix infinite loop crash in analytics graph in some scenarios [75fb6e5]
  • ğŸ› Fix multiple choice parsing to work with non-ASCII chars [4d899c0]
  • âœï¸ Fix the Forge overview link (#2225) [296efeb]
  • ğŸ› Fix subscription cancellation event tracking condition [dffdac6]
  • ğŸ› Better manage newly created subscription in stripe webhook [761602b]
  • ğŸ› Fix iOS scroll still not working on some devices [45e2984]
  • ğŸ› Fix scroll on some iOS devices when chat container is disabled [1e14ae7]
  • ğŸ› Fix height viewport overflow issue on mobile [16aa060]
  • ğŸ› Fix bot client height reactivity [c0bda44]
  • ğŸ› Add conflict margin for Typebot update to handle clock synchronization issues [a2bb9ac]
  • ğŸ’š Fix missing cookie dep [e087a30]
  • ğŸ› Fix multiple choice parser not working with multiple indices [045d62e]
  • ğŸ› Always transform undefined to null values for user name and image in OAuth profile extraction [b8d5899]
  • ğŸš‘ (embed) Fix absolute positioned element not following scroll [6e53baf]
  • ğŸ› Fix ark ui positioning z-index stacking clash with chakra [5b7faa3]
  • ğŸ› Fix some popovers rendering behind content [24c2667]
  • ğŸ› Fix narrow scroll chat container when transparent [89ab2f6]
  • âœï¸ Remove tooltip for high chat usage alert in UsageProgressBars component [d017138]
  • ğŸ› Fix recursive transcript set variable [2338f2b]
  • ğŸ› Fix multi client side action after input block not triggering [0e473f0]
  • ğŸ› Fix on workspace delete, missing redirection to other workspace [b990aed]
  • ğŸ› Avoid redirect to onboarding if env var is missing [dfcbb1f]
  • ğŸ› Patch Gitlab profile parsing for next-auth@v5 compatibility (#2213) [97beef0]
  • ğŸ› Prevent stuck drag state when opening native emoji picker [5ec770a]
  • ğŸ› Fix progress bar position issue on builder preview [a4d6228]
  • ğŸš‘ (lp) Attempt to fix client side crash [8c4c8ff]
  • ğŸ’š Fix typecheck error in TypebotPageV3 [ef82ff8]
  • âœï¸ Fix get-started docs type (#2207) [7cced2f]
  • ğŸ› Fix forge autocomplete input popover rendering behind dialog [47d1bee]
  • ğŸ› Fix number input default locale to browser's language [c43ad4b]
  • ğŸ› Fix double page tracking on router subscription init [c8cd522]

Content

  • ğŸ“ Add "how to create a chatbot for beginners" blog post (#2223) [f1e7eac]
  • ğŸ“ Add new section on hiding the preview message after user interaction. [9699402]
  • ğŸ“ Add "b2b lead qualification" blog post (#2200) [9575725]
  • ğŸ“ Add Blink block documention [e546689]

Internal

  • ğŸ”§ Correctly forward serverFunction call to lp app [ae1898c]
  • ğŸ”§ Adapt MinIO bucket creation script for newer `mc` versions (#2235) [2770ecf]
  • ğŸ”§ Fix new tanstack assets folder source [8432b5b]
  • ğŸ”§ Add POSTHOG_PERSONAL_API_KEY to daily workflow secrets [0cedd50]
  • â™»ï¸ Upgrade to tRPC v11 and use Tanstack Query [90add8c]
  • â™»ï¸ Redirect to onboarding if terms not accepted [d06dbd7]
  • â™»ï¸ Remove isNewUser constraint on onboarding page [91381c9]
  • â™»ï¸ Create new user package and migrate update API to tRPC [9fb016b]

Miscellaneous

  • ğŸ§‘â€ğŸ’» Add startFrom prop to startChat endpoint [cdaa7b8]
  • ğŸ§¹ Move functions Vercel config to dashboard [c156004]
  • ğŸ§‘â€ğŸ’» Improve typebot save conflict toast with overwrite option [235bd99]
  • ğŸ§‘â€ğŸ’» Improve jump block error context details [803e1f4]
  • ğŸ§‘â€ğŸ’» (embed) Better typebot typing on init [01a3eb6]
  • ğŸ§‘â€ğŸ’» Add progress bar slot for custom css [c3c1728]

entry.title: New release for Typebot: v3.10.0
entry.content:
New features

  • âœ¨ Add 360Dialog provider [43328f4]
  • âœ¨ Add Transcript tab in Results details modal [43a3eb5]
  • âœ¨ Add Gmail block (#2253) [40884d5]
  • âœ¨ Add support for array type in Generate variables actions [de7f96a]

UI/UX Improvements

  • âš¡ (dify) Switch to ai-sdk (#2247) [085397e]
  • ğŸš¸ (gmail) Improve OAuth credential popup handling [ce7627f]
  • ğŸš¸ (bot) Improve error message on failed file upload [bac1ee2]
  • ğŸš¸ Add Claude 4 models in suggestion dropdown [16abe1c]

Fixed

  • ğŸ› Fix empty accordion in forged block with preprocessing [167b252]
  • ğŸ› Fix gmail add label [77eb695]
  • ğŸš‘ Fix Google Sheet authentication not refreshing [f33d3b2]
  • ğŸ› Fix bot avatar not displayed on streaming message [541d744]

Content

  • ğŸ“ Remove temporary absence notice from help documentation [dfe98a1]
  • ğŸ“ Add "create multi step form" and "lead qualification questions" blog posts (#2256) [9049101]
  • ğŸ“ Update help documentation to reflect maintainer's temporary absence [8068860]
  • ğŸ“ Add refund policy to terms of service, outlining 14-day refund period for new accounts [217049d]
  • ğŸ“ Add Google workspace limited use of user data policy [1572426]
  • ğŸ“ Update privacy policy to include third-party integration policy [a21d6e9]
  • ğŸ“ Add WA allow list phone number screenshot [0c374d9]
  • ğŸ“ Add more troobleshoot steps to WhatsApp deployment [85b7bae]
  • ğŸ“ Add cookies info and state ISO 27001 compliance [0681926]
  • ğŸ“ Update WhatsApp doc and troubleshooting [65921bb]
  • ğŸ“ Add june blog posts (#2246) [96c08dc]

Internal

  • ğŸ”’ Add Content Security Policy header on builder [a034176]
  • ğŸ”§ (gmail) Add beta badge [763c101]
  • ğŸ”§ Refactor webhookHandler to streamline past due status updates for workspaces [913dbd7]
  • ğŸ”§ Properly exit execute prisma script [24313ba]
  • â™»ï¸ Fix wordpress PHP deprecation warning (#2248) [b5958bd]
  • ğŸ”§ Exit destroy user if no workspaces found [6b8a7dd]
  • â™»ï¸ Harmonize unit test execution across the workspace [354b9e7]
